Title: Halloween
Writer: Rob Zombie (screenplay), John Carpenter, Debra Hill
Actors: Malcolm McDowell, Brad Dourif, Tyler Mane, Daeg Faerch
Plot: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.
Production: Trancas International Films Inc., Nightfall Productions, Dimension Films
